text: So I found some good music mmm So  Music recommendation   I briefly listened to The Dear Hunter in the past  However i never really opened up the notes app and wrote down the story that was being told  So upon relistening and reading others interpretations ive figured this much out about the story  It s about a prostitute in a city who is being hunted down by her previous clients for reasons i dont know yet  she finds out shes  pregnant with a child who is to be cursed with a horrific life of sin and pain unless she raises him out on a lake away from the city  She leaves her job as a prostitute behind to raise her son in a sheltered life where he wont need to know the truth  She raises her son to be unlike the people that were hunting her down in her past    However while she lived on the river  a church was established in the city   The pimp and the priest  is the name of an antagonist were introduced to  People at a bar the mother  Ms  Terri  used to frequent  rat her out to the church and the priest hunts down Ms  Terri  Eventually her past catches up to her and the priest stabs her to death in front of her son  Her son  the dear hunter   is left to never know his mothers past  Unable to continue living in his home he gets on a train to seek out who his father is  He makes his way into the city which supposedly will corrupt him  Ironically Ms  Terris lack of honesty with her son and desperate attempts to protect him had no effect as he would remain cursed  The fire may be gone but the flame still remains  The story is filled with a ton of beautiful symbolism   Im only through   album and   songs on the second one  I cant wait to see where this   act story takes me I really suggest you guys give it a try
summary: The Dear Hunter is a story about a prostitute who is being hunted down by her previous clients. She finds out she is pregnant with a child who is to be cursed with a life of sin and pain unless she raises him out on a lake away from the city. She leaves her job as a prostitute behind to raise her son in a sheltered life where he won't need to know the truth. She raises her son to be unlike the people that were hunting her down in her past. The church established in the city and while she lived on the river a church was established in
cleaned: dear hunter story prostitute hunt previous client find pregnant child curse life sin pain raise lake away city leave job prostitute raise son sheltered life not need know truth raise son unlike people hunt past church establish city live river church establish

text: RelapseFor the first time in a little over a year I m having genuine thoughts of suicide again  The depression never went away  but the suicidal urges did  and for a while I thought I was doing better  Lying in bed last night all I could think of was taking a sharp knife from my kitchen and cutting my wrists  I fantasized about ending it all and embracing the sweet allure of ending the pain I don t think I m in any immediate danger  At the moment they re just thoughts  and they would need to last much longer than a couple of nights for me to actually act on them  But right now I feel defeated  broken and alone  I don t think I will ever be able to love a  normal  life  the way my brain is wired seems to be too big of an obstacle to conquer
summary: For the first time in a little over a year, I'm having thoughts of suicide again. I don't think I'm in any immediate danger, but I feel defeated and alone. I think I won't ever be able to love a normal life.
cleaned: time little year have thought suicide not think immediate danger feel defeat think not able love normal life
